title: hecef Magnetic Knife Strips, 12", Brown
features: STAY ORGANIZED - Tired of knives lying haphazardly in a drawer? This powerful magnetic knife bar lets you arrange your knives stylishly on the wall where they can be quickly and easily accessed!

SAVE SPACE - Space is at a premium in most kitchens, this magnetic knife holder lets you hang your knives on the wall - saving valuable drawer space and providing more convenient access to your knives!
BUILT TO LAST - Made from acacia wood and featuring a powerful magnet, this magnetic knife bar will last for years and years and years. It will never rust and never lose its powerful magnetic charge!
CHILD SAFETY - Ensure young children won't have access to your sharp knives by storing them on the wall out of reach with this powerful magnetic kitchen knife holder!

EASY TO INSTALL - Comes with step by step installation instructions that will allow you to have this kitchen knives holder in place in just five minutes or less! If you are ready to get organized and save space in your kitchen, this magnetic knife bar is ideal. Just click add to cart on this page to get yours today. Also makes a great gift.
description: Advantage 1、Fit horizontally or vertically. Not just for knives the powerful magnet will hold anything metal. 2、Use for kitchen utensils or in the garage for tools, as an office desk tidy. 3、This beautiful Acacia wooden magnetic strip makes it easy to display your prized cutlery collection in a way that will not use up valuable counter space. 4、All of your knives attach magnetically to this 12inch bar which mounts easily to your wall. Daily Care Note: Do not use harsh or abrasive cleaning products. Do not touch fire. Product Parameters: Magnetic Knife Holder Material: Acacia Wooden Product Size: H:2inch W:12inch D:0.8inch Note: The measurement may have a slight error. No knives are included with this magnetic knife bar. Box contains 1 x 12 Inch Magnetic Knife Strip 2 x Stainless steel screws with matching plastic sheath
